title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Feb 9th thru Feb
description:
Eight more broadcasts for all you C2C freaks to enjoy! Thanks in advance to all the seeders and I will of course be here again next week! Stokeman Out............. 

Saturday February 9th, 2008
Staged Accidents
Author Tom Cain, a pseudonym for British journalist David Thomas, discussed his investigation into staged accidents, as well as evidence that Princess Diana was killed by assassins who made the cause of her death appear to be a car crash...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Tom Cain, David Mack

Sunday February 10th, 2008
Robots Today and Tomorrow
Roboticist Daniel H. Wilson returned to the program to talk about the current state of robotics and how robots could be used to battle zombies, invading aliens, werewolves, and ninjas. He detailed the latest evolution in robots that are in the marketplace... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Daniel H. Wilson, Glynis McCants, Steve Hammons

Monday February 11th, 2008
God, Light, & Physics
Author Lee Baumann M.D. described his evolution from an atheist to spiritual perspective, and presented the concept that God could be thought of as light. He cited studies in quantum physics, NDE encounters and religious accounts as all sharing similar... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): T. Lee Baumann, Kevin Mitnick

Tuesday February 12th, 2008
UFOs: Contact & Disclosure
A special 4-hour show devoted to UFOs featured noted author and UFO researcher Jacques Vallee in the first half. Three of his classic works on alien contact were recently reprinted by Anomalist Books. He spoke about his investigation into a 1977 wave... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Jacques F. Vallee, Stephen Bassett

Wednesday February 13th, 2008
Stem Cell Treatments
Appearing for all four hours, author Christian Wilde discussed the latest in heart disease prevention, heart health and the advances being made in adult stem cell research. He noted that doctors often fail to spot heart disease risk factors among patients,... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Christian Wilde, Dr. Warren Sherman, Michel Levesque

Thursday February 14th, 2008
Mind-Over-Matter Experiments
Researcher Lynne McTaggart returned to report on the on-going results of global mind-over-matter experiments (theintentionexperiment.com) that she has sponsored. Because of the way subatomic structures function, the world is not as fixed or final as... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Lynne McTaggart, John M. Curtis

Friday February 15th, 2008
Cursed Calls
During Open Lines, George offered a &#039;curse&#039; hotline for callers who have either been cursed or have placed a curse on another person. A caller from Canada believes she has been cursed by her former husband. She said her ex has a "powerful mind" and has... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, William Connery

Saturday February 16th, 2008
The Future of (Child) Men
Ian spoke with psychologist Dr. Leonard Sax, who discussed the various factors contributing to the steady decline of performance, ambition, and fertility in America&#039;s boys and young men. Sperm counts and testosterone levels of young men in the... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Dr. Leonard Sax
